Subject: Ministery of south french Defense
Description:
We have a new problem with Endpoint Protector...

So far I've only had 2 PCs affected

 

On the Client PC:

- The Endpoint Protector agent says that it manages to contact the server "Last server connection: 2024-07-10 15h55".

 

On the Server:

- The PC appears offline

 

When I try to update the agent policies on the Client PC: Nothing happens

 

I searched the system event log and found this error every time I clicked on "Update policies now".

Is there a solution to this problem?
Solution_Comment__c: Issue was resolved in remote session - Case Closed
